title: Optica
content:
Hello typophiles!  
This _insane typeface design,_ by [Manolo Guerrero](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013124654/http:/www.bluetypo.com/) has finally been released. You can purchase it at [Myfonts.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013124654/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cocijotype/optica/)  
Kind regards!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013124654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3868465665_4108a105ba_o_5088.jpg)
author: Eli

comments.content: This could be the coolest signage face ever.
It is fascinating. Just don't use it for WRONG WAY! GO BACK!
By CROM it's burning my eyefonts!
